posts.post_content:
Didn't realize I had an extra copy. Free to the first response on this thread.

[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/30ws4cp.jpg[/IMG]

Dang it! I've never even seen that before! I'd dig that in my collection. 
Rich

[quote name="SushiX37" post=1309914]Dang it! I've never even seen that before! I'd dig that in my collection. 
Rich[/QUOTE]

There's one selling on EBay right now. 

I got mine last October for about $15. It's an absolute gem. Bill Heitman published The Monster in 1980, and his research was groundbreaking stuff back then. You can find this information on the internet now, but it's a must have for any serious T206 collector.
